Package index

Functions

R functions of the throne package

rnp_flights_data()
Reads and processes data from multiple flights in .tif format and adds metadata
rnp_otms_data()
Read and process OTM data
gen_otm_splines()
Generate OTM splines
correct_flights_data()
Correct flights data
eval_flights_correction()
Evaluate flight correction
match_data()
Match flights to OTM data
predict_thermal_landscape()
Predict thermal landscape

Datasets

Example datasets included with the throne package

flights_metadata
Metadata for example flights
flights_data
Example flights data
otms_metadata
Metadata for example OTMs
otms_data
Example OTMs data
matches
Example matches data
